name: Alien Run (itch) (Maestro)
description:
Race with your friends and see who's the fastest.

Controls Player 1:
  • W to jump.
  • A and S to move left and right respectively.
Player 2:
  • Up to jump.
  • Left and Right to move left and right respectively.
Player 3: From Keyboard:
  • I to jump.
  • J and L to move left and right respectively.
From Joystick:
  • Left Analog Stick or A to jump.
  • Left Analog Stick to move left and right.

NOTE: You need a Gamepad to join the game as Player 3.

Credit
  • The sound effects were generated from https://sfxr.me/.
  • All the assets used in the game were provided by https://www.kenney.nl/.
